explains: n. 副驾驶；自动驾驶仪

sentences.en: My co-pilot suddenly grabbed the wheel.
sentences.cn: 我的副驾驶突然抢过了方向盘。

sentences.en: The co-pilot was at the controls when the plane landed.
sentences.cn: 副驾驶员操纵着飞机着陆。

sentences.en: The captain, the co-pilot and all the crew are safe.
sentences.cn: 机长、副驾驶和所有机组人员都安然无恙。
